channel.title: Aggressive Daggs
channel.description: I added aggressive daggs and fixed the emotes up and made it work from protect from range and I made them use range. Now I want to make it so they only attack you if you go near them... When I go down there they all follow me. can anyone help?

item.title: Aggressive Daggs
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

I don’t know how to do that.
But you could make it were if your standing near that particular object it makes you go in.
And it will only let you in if you have a certain object.
Thats all I could think of.

Read full topic

do you know how to make it so when 2 people stand on those 2 spots the door stays open?

item.title: Aggressive Daggs

item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

On real runescape thats what happens So you should be quite proud of your work.
If you don’t believe me go to the island and go in dungeon.
I bet you get owned in like no time.
